content.text:
# Immovable Cultural Heritage in the Kosovska Mitrovica District

This list includes Immovable Cultural Heritage sites (listed by the ) which are located in the Kosovska Mitrovica District of Serbia – which overlaps with the District of Mitrovica of Kosovo.
